description: Second convolution of Lucas numbers A000032(n+1), n >= 0.
formula: G.f.: ((1+2*x)/(1-x-x^2))^3.a(n)=A060922(n+2, 2) (third column of Lucas triangle).a(n)=(n+1)*((5*n+4)*L(n+2) + (5*n-2)*L(n+1))/10, n >= 1, with the Lucas numbers L(n)=A000032(n)=A000204(n), n >= 1.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Apr 20 2001
